experiences.title: SIH 2023 Finalist (Hardware Edition)
experiences.description: Finalist in the Smart India Hackathon 2023, where we developed an innovative hardware-based solution for the tourism sector, integrating a tourist card, metaverse, and digital twin.

experiences.title: Mastek Deep Blue Season 9 (Semi-Finalist)
experiences.description: Engineered an innovative car parking solution for Mastek, collaborating with a cross-functional team to optimize space usage. Our solution improved parking capacity by 40% under strict deadlines.

experiences.title: Mastek Deep Blue Season 10 (Semi-Finalist)
experiences.description: Currently working on an AI-driven project to estimate physical attributes and object dimensions from selfies.

experiences.title: IIT ResCon Aachar 2024 (Top 10 Teams)
experiences.description: Secured 9th place among 100+ submissions in the research presentation competition at ResCon Aachar 2024, held at IIT Bombay.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer Intern
experiences.description: Worked on a GRC (Governance, Risk, and Compliance) automation project, providing a centralized platform for risk management. Key features included POA&M tracking, Jira integration, and an enhanced user interface for seamless interaction. Additionally, I contributed to the CNCM website's enhancements for a major conference presentation.

experiences.title: The Quaero
experiences.description: Developing 'The Quaero,' a cybersecurity SaaS platform using the MERN stack. Implementing an admin panel, user authentication, and dynamic content management.

experiences.title: DevIgnite Hackathon
experiences.description: Explored challenges in the cloud and DevOps domains through hands-on problem-solving.

experiences.title: SHARK-A-THON
experiences.description: Presented an innovative startup idea in a competitive environment.

experiences.title: Project Exhibition Contest - Idea Unboxed
experiences.description: Showcased a creative project idea in an exhibition-style contest.
